title: Glow Stars
text:
Glow Stars is the debut studio <a href="album">album</a> by <a href="Heather%20Nova">Heather Nova</a>, released in <a href="1993%20in%20music">1993</a>.
Critical reception.
<a href="AllMusic">AllMusic</a> wrote: "'Ear to the Ground' and the title track shimmer with sweet acoustic guitars, while tracks like 'Bare' and 'Spirit in You' prance around dark melodies steeped in hollow dreamscapes."
Track listing.
All songs written by Heather Nova.
